name: Wikipedia Races
description: A single-page app that uses the Wikipedia API, Angular, and Jquery. Games are kept track of using Firebase.

name: Battleship
description: A version of Battleship, made only with Ruby-on-Rails. It Shows knowledge of dynamic  routing,  SQL language, and how MVCs like Rails.

name: The Word Definer
description: An application that allows kids to add words to a list, then add their own definitions to those words. Users can add multiple definitions and remove words all together. This app implements a fully functioning swear filter.
